column5: ...since we've had a "good morning" thread.  Hope everyone had a great long weekend   It's a short week for most so returning won't hurt too much I hope  .  I've enjoyed reading the reports over the weekend, but I'm srue there are a few that haven't made there way yet...still recuperating???  Anyway, havea  great day all...  Maureen

Mornin Moe, and your right, it's  been awhile since the early morning club had a meeting.  They used to be alot of fun, but would you believe I actually received a PM from one of our long standing members one day telling me that I only instigated the "Good Morning" threads to pad my post count ??  That's what some folks do when they don't have much of a life I spose.  What a moron.....
Good mornin' Earlybirds!!!  Looks like I'm paddin' my post count too Lew!
Some of us are still working...  well kind of
I'm usually right there with you early birds.... but this week, I have to days of 12pm starts.. lol  but GOOD MORNING just the same....  Have a great day everyone...
This is early for me...Good mornin'  Just a quick look at the board before heading over to Carp Point to meet up with Crappieperchhunter...  Or Lew...As my pal Photoz would say..."WHAT A MAROOOON"

The only reason for getting up at the mo/lew o'clock hour is to go fishing period. I'm not in that big a hurry to get to work  Have a great day!   Glen the only paddin' you need is for your arse, when old yeller kicks it!  Whopper
A nice way to start the day, by saying good morning.    I've been too busy to check in every day.  I hope everyone has a great week.  Pam
Sad day when someone can't just appreciate a morning greeting...sheesh...well to heck with them....might have to post one every morning now  Maureen
Well for all those starting the long night shift, this is our morning..
Not here to say good morning..just want to pad my count also. Joe
